attributes.action: Take firm action to stop panic buying. We need to protect everyone.
attributes.additional_details: Because the vulnerable including the elderly and those with underlying health conditions should be able to get what they need. Many can't get help from friends/relatives and should socially distance in crowded spaces. We are in war like times, when food was rationed, but so much more advanced with technology to support the proportionate distribution and supply of essential foods and household goods.
attributes.background: Make the supermarkets do more to keep the shelves better stocked so everyone can get what they want. At present there is no real effort or visible control.
